TopicTitle: [1.2] Can you make a probe ingnore telemetry?

Articles.Content:
Is it posible with moding to make a probe ingnore signal and always have full controls in 1.2? And if so how would I do it?

I would prefer to do it to 1 or 2 cores rather then all if posible...

I don't know much about how the code works, but presumably you could force the game to treat your chosen probe core as a crewed command pod. Command pods with crew always are always fully controllable (at least as far as the ability of the pilot allows).
I thought of trying that, but there is not any diffrence as far as the game is concerend within command moduals, probes are just a ship with a crew of zero....

On ‎18‎.‎9‎.‎2016 at 11:19 AM, Imca said:

Is it posible with moding to make a probe ingnore signal and always have full controls in 1.2? And if so how would I do it?

I would prefer to do it to 1 or 2 cores rather then all if posible...

Just add these two lines in probe's "ModuleCommand": 

requiresTelemetry = false
SignalRequired = false
I thought there was an option in the settings menu to turn off the telemetry requirement.
